modName: Full Plate Armor from TES4 Oblivion
summary: Armor conversion from Tes4 mod - Plate Armor Plus Woman\'s move edition by Nao4288
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=20]Full Plate Armor from TES4 Oblivion[/size][/b][/center]



[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29341-1-1357197452.jpg[/img]


[size=10]Description[/size]

This is conversion of Oblivion Plate Armor Plus – Womans Move Edition originally posted by nao4288.
I kinda liked its own shape, especially how it looks like around the body in original format thus I tried to make this as close as original one so overall shape will be little different compared to usual body shape in Skyrim.

I also added Blackwood full mask & half mask which were not available in original one.

All these plate armors are lore friendly, stand alone, Heavy sets  [b][u]for any types of bodies but only for female[/b][/u].



[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29341-2-1357197452.jpg[/img]

From left to right, Steel plate, Bronze plate, Damascus armor, and Blackwood armor are shown above and details are as follows.



Steel Plate – This is regular Steel Plate quality in armor value & weight. Can be made in same manner as regular Steel Plate armor in Skyrim

Bronze Plate – This is regular Dwarven Plate quality in armor value & weight. Can be made in same manner as regular Dwarven Armor in Skyrim

Damascus Plate – This is regular Ebony plate quality in armor value & weight. Can be made in same manner as regular Ebony Armor in Skyrim

Blackwood Plate – This is regular Daedric plate quality in armor value & weight. Can be made in same manner as regular Daedric Armor in Skyrim



[size=10]How to Install[/size]

Extract the archive and copy the contents in your Skyrim / Data folder
Open the Skyrim launcher and check the AoD – Full Plate.esp in the Data Files section



[size=10]How to Use[/size]

Can be crafted under each designated tab with Advanced Armor perk in every forge in Skyrim



[size=10]Credits[/size]

Bethesda Softworks TES4 Oblivion
Plate Armor Plus – Womens Move Edition by nao4288
[url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/36527]http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/36527[/url]
author: aodnagne
